pages.text: This is the Refined Gold Ingot. Its properties are better then regular gold. Lets see how to make it! $(br2)First you have to sand an ingot down with some grit paper. $(br)Then combine it with some refining dust.
Now that you have the Refined Gold Dust, you have to make it into an unfired ingot.
After you have the unfired ingot you have to smelt that to get the Refined Gold Ingot! $(br2) Note: You can also smelt it in a blasting furnace!
